value.title: Effortlessly Embed Your Live Power BI Report in PowerPoint
value.excerpt: In today's world, we're always looking for ways to streamline our work and save time. One of the ways to do this is to integrate your Live Power BI Report and Visual directly into Microsoft PowerPoint. This short video will demonstrate how you can do this seamlessly without the need for taking screenshots

value.title: Exclude Blank Records from Distinct Count in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Wed with the DAX series. Today I‚Äôm going to explain one DAX function in Power BI which is ‚Äì DISTINCTCOUNTNOBLANK()   When we use the DISTICTCOUNT() function in Power BI this will calculate distinct count for the column. value.title: Forecasting in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can forecast our data in Power BI. We will be discussing which visualization supports forecasting in Power BI.
